charges.charge_description: 18:1341 &; 2 MAIL FRAUD AND AIDING AND ABETTING: (Count 1: $250,000-5 yrs; S/A $50.00; 3 yrs. Supervised Release) (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant assessed $50 to VCF; Restitution ordered in the amount of $400,000.00; 5 years probation; 150 hours of community service to begin following completion of the second year of probation; defendant to pay for the daily costs of electronic monitoring/home confinement in the amount of $4.79 per day; defendant to serve 24 months of home confinement with electronic monitoring with work release and medical emergency privileges; Ct Rep Debra Futrell (1)
